title: Skin concept: Definitely not Fizz
body: Riot please, this shall be a masterpiece

replies.body: ..Why would you give Annie a skin of Annie?
Draven got a Draven skin, so why not?
u know i have this idea for a pool party braum skin for awhile. braum's ult would be a waterslide. i dunno lol
You should post your idea in your own post. This post is for this beautiful picture of Annie, not your skin concept.
ok calm down lol. just was throwing it out there for fun
